title: Get Smart TV show titles
content:
Anyone know of a font that is reminiscent of the font used for the Get Smart titles? I don't need an exact match, just the same feeling.

You can see some examples here:  
 [http://www.wouldyoubelieve.com/doors.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040516/http:/www.wouldyoubelieve.com/doors.html "http://www.wouldyoubelieve.com/doors.html")

(Scroll down a bit; I'm looking for the sort of Latin with the bouncy baseline.)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040516im_/http:/typophile.com/files/getsmart_6222.gif)
author: John Nolan

comments.content: I think your best option is to get a font like [Latin Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040516/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/latin_bold/&sample_text=GET%20SMART&sample_size=36) and bounce the baseline yourself. A few curve tweaks and you're there.
